rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 29 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 9:20 PM, 15 July 2025(Tuesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Cavite, Batangas, Laguna, Quezon, Zambales, Bataan, Tarlac, Metro Manila and Bulacan within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Rizal(Jala-Jala, Pililla), Nueva Ecija(San Antonio, Zaragoza, Jaen, San Leonardo, San Isidro) and Pampanga(Floridablanca, Lubao) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
